channel.title: Comments on: “[T]o Be Beautiful and Awesome and Butt-Kicking”: G. Willow Wilson
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Interview w/ Erin K Wagner on A.I., Being a Medievalist, and Centering Women Creators – The Bookwyrm's Guide to the Galaxy
item.dc:creator: Interview w/ Erin K Wagner on A.I., Being a Medievalist, and Centering Women Creators – The Bookwyrm's Guide to the Galaxy
item.description: […] in the field for a very long time. I talk about Margaret Cavendish, Janelle Monae, Marie de France, G. Willow Wilson, Charlie Jane Anders (and the Wiscon experience) and many more—representatives across hundreds of […]
